root.cn: 这是一款平板上以古诗词为核心的文字类应用，细腻的古典中国风，清新淡雅的视觉效果，创新式的游戏体验，在游戏中可以感受到中国古代文学的魅力，进入诗词的世界。 玩法超级简单：交换文字位置，让文字显示在正确的位置。 寓教于乐，老少皆宜。快来试试你的诗词文化功底吧。
root.en: This is a text app with ancient poetry as the core on the Pad. It has exquisite classical Chinese style, fresh and elegant visual effect and innovative game experience. In the game, you can feel the charm of ancient Chinese literature and enter the world of poetry. Play super simple: exchange text position, let the text display in the right position. It is suitable for all ages to teach and enjoy. Let's try your poetry and culture.
